is_featured.name: Add Tailwind CSS to Next.js
is_featured.subtitle: Quickly In 4 Steps
is_featured.description: Recent versions of Next.js come packaged with Tailwind CSS, which we can enable during project creation. If you missed installing it out of the box, this guide will walk you through four simple steps to install and configure Tailwind CSS. Even though this post is tailored for Next.js, a similar method can be used to set up Tailwind in a React.js application as well.
is_featured.img_alt: minimalistic cartoon style laptop nextjs app tailwindcss color swatches code snippets black outline jpeg

is_featured.name: The Art of Minimalism in Modern Design
is_featured.subtitle: Transforming Spaces
is_featured.description: Explore how minimalism influences contemporary design choices, from architecture to interior decor. Discover practical tips for incorporating minimalistic principles to create serene and functional spaces that prioritize simplicity and usability.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of burger filled with onion lettuce meat patty cheese with teal background jpeg

is_featured.name: The Future of Smart Home
is_featured.subtitle: Integrating Technology for a Seamless Lifestyle
is_featured.description: Dive into the world of DIY furniture building using reclaimed wood. This post outlines essential tools and techniques, plus step-by-step guides to create beautiful, sustainable pieces that enhance your living space while reducing waste.
is_featured.img_alt: cartoon illustration of windows laptop with grey background jpeg
